#### Hem your pants {.unlisted .unnumbered}

<!-- <span style="color:#a1a1a1; font-weight:325;  "> -->
```{=html}
<div class= "updated-on-date" >
    <em>Created on March 5th, 2023.</em>
</div>
```

Depending on your height the type of break you decided to go for will enhance the lenght of your legs. 

For small body frames I recomend no break to half break as this created the ilusion of longer legs and do not distract the viewer from looking constantly at your feet.

    <img class= "rounded" src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2451/0925/files/pant_1024x1024.jpg?v=1637008692" style="width: 100%; ">
